actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.

official_title: Relating to the treatment of Social Security under any constitutional amendment requiring a balanced budget.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Declares that, for the purposes of any constitutional amendment requiring a balanced budget, the appropriate committees of the House and the Senate shall report to their respective Houses implementing legislation to achieve a balanced budget without increasing the receipts or reducing the disbursements of the Federal Old-Age and Survivors Insurance Trust Fund and the Federal Disability Insurance Trust Fund to achieve that goal.

titles.title: Relating to the treatment of Social Security under any constitutional amendment requiring a balanced budget.
